promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic basic rabbit dark-type pokemon wearing dark bracers. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or rabbit. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptolagus, a a gigantic basic rabbit dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Dark Poison. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "rabbit", "dark" or "Cryptolagus". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, rabbit-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Cryptolagus, the nocturnal burrower. Dwelling in shadowy tombs, it emits a venomous aura to deter unwanted guests. With keen adaptability, this Pokémon thrives in the most cryptic circumstances.
